structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Persons enforcing law immune from liability.
law.text: Anyone participating in good faith pursuant to KRS 72.210 to 72.275 or the administrative regulations of the secretary of justice and public safety shall have immunity from any civil liability that might otherwise be incurred or imposed.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 149, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 114, sec. 14.
